column4: hey, i am trying to use virtualbox-ose and i am having trouble, i got an error message saying this "VirtualBox kernel driver not installed. The vboxdrv kernel module was either not loaded or /dev/vboxdrv was not created for some reason. Please install the virtualbox-ose-modules package for your kernel, e.g. virtualbox-ose-modules-generic.." and ideas?
does anyone know what i am doing wrong?
What are you trying to do?
